rComments: Bruce made learning about Jewish Literature and Culture into an amazing experience.  He is extremely knowledgeable and passionate about the subject and it really shines through in his fantastic lectures.  Each lecture feels like a story, connects to the theme of the class, and makes lecture something you actually want to go to.  Highly recommended.

Took Jewish lit for a GE. As a Jew interesting to learn more about my heritage, but the class got more and more dull as time progressed. Do NOT buy any of the books as you will waste your money. Midterm+Final were incredibly easy. Bruce is a super sweet guy who really cares about the material and his students. Good GE course
He is a sweet man who knows a ton about his subject and provides an easy class where you can learn a lot. You can get an A by barely paying attention
So nice and supportive. He's very easygoing and always happy to help with anything that you need. Such a sweet guy!!!
He's a great teacher and a fun guy to listen to

This guy has got to be one of the most amazing lecturers. All of his lectures were very engaging and very well organized. If you take notes during lectures, that's even better because you'll have a lot of stuff to work with for essays and discussions. Awesome professor. Definitely would consider taking another class with him.

Thompson is one of the best professors I've ever had. He's hilarious and can make almost any topic interesting. If you do all the reading the essays and final should not be difficult. I'd definitely take this class again.

Bruce is the best professor I've ever taken, he's a sweet adorable man and I could listen to him talk all day. I've taken 4 classes with him at UCSC and you will get a good grade if you go to lecture and take good notes! He's an easy grader. His lectures are great and incorporate films, music, documentaries. UCSC is lucky to have him :D

this class was a senior seminar and being interested in the subject was one thing but Bruce took it to a new level. it was kind of scary how much i loved his class, his teaching style, and the feeling of being comfortable around a professor.

Bruce is the best history professor at UCSC hands down. His lectures are always interesting, and the readings he selects are very useful. His tests and midterms are always fair and he is more than happy to help you if you ask. If you've never taken a Euro History class before, take any of his courses!

I loves Professor Thompson's class! He makes everything really clear and wants to help you do well in his class. He tells jokes and tries to make class fun by showing movies. I wish I could take all my classes with Professor Thompson.

I've had 3 classes with Bruce and each one has been great. He is my favorite professor on campus because of his passion for his work, his engaging personality, and his friendly demeanor. Never pass a chance to take a class with this man because they're always great.
Bruce is a great professor and and knows how to keep students engaged in class. He is extremely nice, helpful and gives extensions on papers within reason. I loved having him for core!

Bruce is the sweetest man ever! There's nothing but good things to say about him. He's an awesome Professor and is great at engaging students. He makes you want to learn. I recommend taking at lease one of his class before graduating.

Great profess. His lectures are very clear, and he uses videos to keep class interesting. If you're ever bored in class, his dorky jokes will keep you up. The reading is a bit demanding [one book a week, ouch] but the books can be found for super cheap, and you'll find it'll be hard to pass if you don't read. easy midterm, paper and final.

Very good professor! One midterm, one (easy-)paper, one final. Attendance in section counts. Bad TA. Didn't do the reading, still got an A because Bruce's lecture notes and lectures are awesome and clear. He really gets you involved with the material. Loving history helps a lot too. Take any of his classes. Totally worth it.

PRAISE BRUCE!Literally one of the best teachers I have ever had. Makes the class clear, informative and interesting. Always positive, helpful and funny. Bruce is the kind of teacher that makes you want to succeed.The reading load was tough (a book per week) but enjoyable. Take his class, you won't be sorry!

He is the best history teacher/professor I have had. He made the material easy to understand in his lectures and uses videos to stop the lectures from being boring. However, there is A LOT of required reading for this class. Overall he has a good sense of humor, a better teaching ability, and I learned a lot about a subject that I don't care for

Bruce is just the most charming man I have ever had the pleasure of learning from. He's funny and although His 178 involved a huge chunk of time to be sitting in one place and listening, he made the lessons interesting and was careful to give us breaks in between. He does give a lot of reading but it's all great stuff. The final wasn't hard either.
Best teacher i have ever had. He knew exactly what he was talking about. He lectures with out note and is AWESOME. He also posts most of his lectures online which is so helpful.
Couldn't have asked for more.  The best there is, take his classes!
HILARIOUS. take his classes. just do it.
My favorite teacher so far.  I looked forward to this class everyday!

I took Modern Jewish Intellectual History with him, and he is my advisor.  One of the best and most interesting History Professors at UCSC.  A lot of reading assigned, but he didn't seem to expect everyone to do everything, and all the works were really worth reading.  Take anything you can with him, he will make it worthwhile and a great class.

BEST prof I've had at UCSC thus far. He's very charismatic and intelligent, which shows in his lectures. I always looked forward to class, as he made the material very clear, interesting, and often entertaining.

Taking film and holocaust with Bruce was great- He's a fun guy and his lectures were really informative. The movies he chose for the class were sometimes boring, but always relevant. His final is incredibly fair, and he is always around to help his students.
I love Bruce!  It was because of his class that I became a history major.  He is so passionate about his subject it was contageous.  Cograts on your teaching award Bruce!

he is one of the best teachers I've had at ucsc. He took his class very seriously, but was so helpful, and his lectures were so interesting, i actually woke up every day at 8 am to attend!  i wish i was a history major just so i could have bruce as a teacher again.
Best George Bush Impression EVER!
No Comments
Great guy, interesting class, but his lectures and soft voice will lull u to sleep. Sorry Bruce!
You can tell Thompson loves his subject and teaching.  4 years after I graduated, he still has time to answer questions and suggest reading for me.  He also was nice enough to recommend me for EAP.
hes the man
he is an amazing professor who cares about his students and the content that he teaches.  Students are not his pay check and he loves to teach.

Bruce is awesome, I loved the class. He had really interesting stories, and keep the whole class engaged.I was excited to go to class. The tests werent bad, especially because he would give you options for what would be on them. The only problem was my ta :Anders Otternes- another reviewer had the right idea- RUN AWAY. Sections were TERRIBLE.

Bruce is one of the best teachers at UCSC. in class, he plays film clips so the class stays interesting throughout. He's a great guy, but his TA Anders was the biggest waste to TA, if you get him, run like hell.

Bruce Thompson is incredible as a teacher. The readings are intense (what can you expcet, it's a History class!) but they are amazingly engaging. Bruce is so enthusiastic about what he is teaching (and such an adorable person to talk to)that it is absolutely contagious. Take this class, for History majors and non-majors since you won't regret it!

Students who think they are getting an education in Bruce's classes are mistaken.  Any instructor who allows interpretive dance in lieu of a final is suspect.  With standards like these, it's no wonder that serious academics see ucsc as a joke and a ucsc diploma as irrelevant.

What an amazing person and teacher.  He's a complete sweetheart and his passion for what he is teaching definitely makes you excited about the material also.  Bruce is very, very helpful and his little jokes are great.  If you love film clips (really good ones at that), take this class!  Oh, and like reading too.  Haha.
Bruce is adorable! He is a fabulous teacher, and understands that students don't only learn through teachers talking, but videos and text as well. Great class!!!
Bruce is really funny, and really personable.  One of my top three professors at UCSC. He knows a****load about film, and about history.  A very nice man.
Sexiest man in this department. Good method of blending lectures and videos. Great handshakes too. XOXO
I wish he taught more classes, I'd take them all!  Really makes things understandible and he has a sense of humor to boot.

Bruce was one of the best teachers that i have ever had. he made european history exciting and clear! we had at least one film clip a day, which made the 70 min. fly by. take a class from bruce, he is the best!
Bruce is the best!  He is funny, really helpful and a great teacher!
Very well learned, well spoken.  Lectures are enjoyable and he is very helpful.  His classes aren't a breeze but if you do your work you'll earn your grade easily.

Bruce is amazing. I took Film and the Holocause from him and I loved him so much and I was so exctied when I found out he was teaching a core class that I could take. He is very intelligent and a wonderful person. He is humorous and understanding.
Easily one of the top5 History professors at UCSC.  I'll be taking yet another class of his spring quarter.  He is not boring, very knowledgeable and approachable.

Bruce Thompson is my favorite professor yet.  He is excellent at making lecture fascinating and wants to see students succeed.  He's funny and accessible.  I learned a lot in his class and am considering taking a class at 8am just because he's teaching it
Bruce is hands down the best! Witty, personable, engaging...he has it all.  i took his film and holocaust class, and adored him.  i can't stress this enough: everyone must take a class with him.

Bruce is the best, no question! Two classes and one more on the way, he's one professor I can never get tired of listening to. If you're even slightly inclined on taking an intro history class, he's the greatest!

Great teacher. His lectures are clear, concise, and interesting - a difficult feat for a History teacher. His classes convinced me to officially declare my European History major. Generally enjoyed the readings too.
I am a history major now because Bruce is so cool! He is hilarious. I believe that he could make anything interesting. You should definately take him!
Great teacher! Lectures can be somewhat bland, but overall, he's a good teacher!

Bruce Thompson is king of history, now and forevermore.  Anyone who rated him less than 5 deserves a stern whooping and should perhaps be summarily executed.  Seriously, Bruce Thompson was the main factor in my decision to become a history major.

Interesting teacher, but overall not that great. The TA's were ridiculous at times, and only a few of the readings were worth it, the others just seemed like fluff. majority of the class seemed to be in various states of the dream cycle.
Probably the coolest history teacher at UCSC. He's clear, effective, nice, funny, and, most importantly, rarely boring (quite a feat for a history professor).

Bruce is a great professor, but there was a lot of material to cover and a lot of reading assigned for only a 10 week course. The midterm was based mostly only lectures and the final was based mostly on readings, but overall this was a good class (although the subject was a little boring at times) and bruce is a great professor!
A wonderful man and teacher. Just take him if you can !
Basically bruce is the sickest guy in the history of ever. take any and every class this man offers

i dont see how anyone couldn't like Bruce.  He knows his stuff.  lectures were, I thought, a bit unorganized, but thats the nature of the class (Israel/Palestine).  I learned just about all i could expect on the topic.  I would take him again in a heartbeat

His lectures are so clear that you don't even need to really read his books to write an A+ paper. Just take good notes in lecture because he'll go over quotes and what not to write a good paper. Going to every class also helps. He's not a boring teacher at all, shows good film clips during every class and has a great sense of humor! =]

I love Bruce Thompson.  He is an amazing teacher and loves/knows a lot about what he is teaching.  He is hilarious and defintiely warmed up to us all about halfway through, at which point I loved going to class just to hear him speak and tell jokes.  Awesome man, interesting class.  The TA I had for this class sucked, but clearly that's irrelevant.

Bruce is the best!  Not only is he adorable, but he is an amazing teacher.  He is so fun to listen to.  I looked forward to all lectures.  He has long office hours and is such a pleasure to talk to.  He tells the cutest jokes and the film clips are great.  I love Bruce!
nice and fun
Interesting, understanding, and very helpful. Bruce is one of the best professors I have had here at UCSC. If you have the chance, take any of his courses.
I LOVE HIM!!!!!! He is the best teacher, so funny, so adorable, and sooo nice. Very very intelligent, and his class and reading selections reflect that. I hope he never leaves UCSC!
A fantastic professor and a fantastic human being. You'd be a fool not to take his class.

Bruce is an amazing teacher. His personality drives you not only to care about this class but to invest yourself into learning the material. The class pays a lot of attention to the art and  social issues of history (my favorites). Highly recommended.

Bruce is a pleasure to learn from, he is jovial every day, and will take any question seriously into the conversation. Gets a little off track sometimes, but it is just more information to be learned. Two tests, easy, and one paper, easy.

Bruce rocks, we are lucky to have him at UCSC. I have taken 4 classes by him. He expects good writing and will give advice in order to help the process. His lectures help you to remember the material. 3 papers and a final written exam.

bruce is an easy teacher even though he usually assigns a ton of books. he doesn't expect all of it to be read but the selections are pretty good. with that said you'll still want to do your reading/work since the TA's do the grading and not bruce unfortunately =(

Bruce Thomson is a fabulous little man.  I never thought modern European history could be interesting, but I actually wanted to go to class even though roll was not taken.  Instead of text books we read quite a few novels, but most of them were quite good.  Anyway, my point is, I would and probably will take another class from Bruce.
Amazing, interesting, not very difficult. The best teacher i've had so far.

awesome, and really cute. The class is really interesting and the books we read (though alot) are wonderful. He sends you the lecutre notes, and we watch movies every lecture. Very Interesting material.
super interesting class, shows lots of fun movies, hilarious guy.  very approachable. take all his clases!
Awesome teacher. Friendly, funny, an all around good guy. Highly recommend taking any of his classes

Not exactly a history class but still interesting and engaging. No boring, long lectures (not a professor who needs to hear himself talk to feel good about himself.) Lots of good student discussion, great videos and good, clear paper assignments. Bruce is helpful and sweet, one of the best at UCSC.
Bruce was sweet.  He manages to lecutre an entire class with out notes, and keeps it interesting.  Very highly recommended

Bruce is one of the best teachers I have ever had, and I am not even a history major. He is passionate about his work and is extremely smart. His lectures are interesting and his tests and papers are fair. If you need to take a history class to get rid of a GE take one of his.

I took 30c, film hist, and espionage seminar with Bruce. He was also my department advisor. He is one of the most amazing teachers I have ever had and the best History teacher at UCSC. He wrote recommendations and helped me get into grad school. UCSC would't have been the same experience without him

I'm taking my senior seminar with him and he's awesome!  He's so helpful and more than willing to work with students if they're having any difficulties.  This is my 4th class with him and I still find his teaching style extremely helpful.  I recommend his classes to anyone.
AWESOME TEACHER!!  His lips is too funny, but the man really kept my interest and is a very friendly to students when you have questions.  A++++++++++
Wow, what a great professor, he is so sweet and almost too fair and forgiving! Really! Such a smart,interesting, great great professor!
Bruce is such a nice guy.  He's smart too!  I think he's fair and he assembles a great reading list.  I liked his class a lot, and I hope he teaches more in the future, just not at 8 AM!
best...teacher...ever!

Bruce was amazing! He was absolutely adorable, sweet, funny, interesting, and he really seemed passionate about his topic. Not very difficult if you do most or some of the reading. And some of the readings are pretty interesting. Definitely recommend him!
bruce is the man! He has the amazing command on his topic i've ever seen. In addition, he has a great sense of humor and a wonderful teaching style. Bruce is bruce!
This guy is awesome and he teaches history very clearly and with much knowledge, the video clips he shows in every class really help bring the subject to life. Plus he's cool to talk to.
Bruce is the reason I became a history major. He is the best prof at UCSC.

Bruce knows his stuff.  Unreasonable amount of books for course, interesting films though.  In class essays, and one term paper that will help your grade.  Short answer on the final will kill you if you haven't read.  Perhaps the best history professor.
He was the kindness professor I have ever had at this university thus far. He is very clear and presents the material well. He clearly knows his stuff. Take this cours!
intersting teacher. makes classes fairly entertaining

Bruce is the kindest, most personable, hilarious, and interesting professor I've had at UCSC. He has an astonishing amount of film knowledge under his belt and makes insightful, brilliant comments in class. He is a lovely person!

Great lectures! Bruce is very entertaining and adorable, lots of reading but well worth the time. History30c was a great class but made even better because Bruce was there, even though we read 10 books!!!!
Great teacher ! super sweet and puts things in a way that you understand and find interesting. The best professor I have had thus far
He is the sweetest, most adorably professor ever! Very funny and interesting...He's just so great!
